1.content: You wake up in liones in the middle of a busy street you can see a tavern called the boar hat and a castle in the distance where do you want to go
1.title: Getting started

11.content: You walk into the bar and hear the laughter of men and women enjoying mead and look around the bar looking for the characters you know can help you see Meliodas,Elizabeth,ban and gowther inside the bar and you think you seen diane in the distance
11.title: You head for the boar hat

choices: You. Are stepped on by melascula
You get wrapped in gloxina vines
13.content: You walk in the forest and feel a dark energy but you keep walking towards it not scared of what it could be or is you get to a clearing an run into melascula,Derieri,and gloxinia they notice your presence and you start to run as soon as they look in your direction
13.title: You head for the wildrness

info.brief_description: You are shrunk around the characters of seven deadly sins male and female are allowed
info.description: You are shawn a anime lover who's favorite anime is seven deadly sins one day you notice a mysterious glow coming from the tv and are pulled into the world of seven deadly sins except everything seems bigger than its supposed to try to survive in this great new world
